amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the provision in the bill which requires FERC to automatically issue permits generated by other agencies if the deadline is missed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-272 to strike the provision that requires FERC to automatically issue other agencies' permits if the deadline is missed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 233 (Roll no. 606).
